data.title: Manoj Gopinath
data.text:
2015-future

C-DAC @ Font Designer

I have handled the front-end design aspect of GIST range of software products like ISM, LEAP Office, iLEAP, iPlugin, Chitrankan, LEAP Mail, LIPS etc. Even managing the international Conference like SAARC, Indo-European Conference, Workshop on Calligraphy and Typography, IDN, Expression ‘08 are few in the list. Have coordinated and directed Documentary films for National Roll out plan (free CD release in all Indian languages ) Directed a film for INDG (http://www.indg.in) inaugurated by Hon. President of India Mrs. Pratibha Patil. Completed an another film for National Service Delivary Gateway (https://nsdg.gov.in) going to be inaugurated by Hon. Prime Minister of India Mr. Manmohan Singh.

2015-future

Mutation Media @ Font Designer

20 years of experience in Digital Type design. I have designed more than 100 Fonts in Malayalam which is used in leading news papers, Magazines, Advertising agencies, Film and television Industries in Kerala. Even I have designed One Font in African script called “Shumom”. Few fonts in other South Indian languages like Tamil, Kannada, Telugu and One font in Tibetan Languages in Open Type and True Type formants

1996-2011

@ C-DAC @ Typography

Before joining with CDAC I was the art director of a Handwritten Magazine called “ Chuvarezhuthu” in which lots of famous writes from Kerala used write. So I was instrumental to create the different styles of Titles for each of articles which will express the inner meaning of the articles. That had given me a lots of freedom to experiment different kind of styles in Typedesign. Later on few of the design which I had done for the magazine is implemented in digital type design. When I talked about type design I can't forget about that magazine. I belive that it's a turning point of my journey in Type design. Even the sign borad designers influenced me in creating different kind of styles..
